summary: A comprehensive suite of unit tests that validate the parsing, decoding, encoding, and hierarchical handling of IEEE 802.11 (Wi‑Fi) frames, including management, control, and data frames, RadioTap headers, and security mechanisms such as WEP, WPA, and WPA2, using the Impacket library.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of a Wi‑Fi packet processing library, enabling reliable development, maintenance, and security analysis of 802.11 protocol implementations.
